Title: Kill Ari (2)
Plot: Still stressed over Kate's death, Gibbs is even more hurt when Ari kidnaps Ducky and decides to play with his mind. Gibbs sends Tony to follow Ziva, and after Jenny and Gibbs are almost shot to death, he is even more determined to finish once and for all with Ari, and Ziva's strange connection to Ari will be just the help that he needs.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Sasha Alexander, Rudolf Martin, Cote de Pablo, Gloria Votsis, Pancho Demmings, Joe Spano, Lauren Holly
